title: VoxPublica
description: E-reader and audio book player featuring works from the public domain. This is my capstone project from developer boot camp and features a React web app front end powered by a Django/PostgreSQL database with a Python layer in between.

title: Hangman
description: An HTML and JavaScript implementation of the classic letter-guessing game. Pulls a random word from a public API and uses the HTML canvas element to update the drawing on the screen after incorrect guesses.

title: Pursuit of Trivia
description: The capstone project from my Intro to Web Development class. This single-page app uses dynamic rendering and JavaScript DOM manipulation to update content based on user interaction. The general goal was to create a trivia API-driven replacement for the boxes of (often outdated) cards used in... a particular trivia board game.

title: Boom Town
description: A web page to accompany a history/research project about nuclear weapons testing in the 1950s. Makes use of the HTML/CSS grid layout system and also features embedded media and extensive custom styling.

title: Mind Reader
description: Fun multi-view app that plays a game with the user to give the effect of reading the user's mind. Utilizes page state and dynamic content creation.

title: Alarm Clock
description: Alarm clock app that lets the user select a wake-up time. Using the JavaScript Date() object, the app monitors the current system state and alerts the user at their specified time. Features a retro-computing theme.

title: Tic-Tac-Toe
description: React-based implementation of the classic Xs and Os game. Allows for user name input, keeps track of turns and monitors for win conditions.

title: Weather App
description: Utilizes an open weather API to display data about the user's location based on zip code input. Makes use of dynamic content creation using JavaScript's DOM manipulation capabilities.

title: To-Do List
description: Single-page app that uses React, state variables and local storage to help users keep track of tasks.
